verses.text: \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is not \w haughty|strong="H1361"\w*, nor mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w lofty|strong="H7311"\w*: neither do I \w exercise|strong="H1980"\w* myself in great \w matters|strong="H1419"\w*, or in things too \w high|strong="H6381"\w* for me.\f + \fr 131.1 \ft exerciseâ€¦: Heb. walk\f*\f + \fr 131.1 \ft high: Heb. wonderful\f*

Surely I have \w behaved|strong="H7737"\w* and \w quieted|strong="H1826"\w* \w myself|strong="H5315"\w*, as a child that is \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* of his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add is\add* even as a weaned \w child|strong="H1580"\w*.\f + \fr 131.2 \ft myself: Heb. my soul\f*

Let \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* from henceforth and \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 131.3 \ft henceforth: Heb. now\f*
